description: With 60 years of history behind it, Emilio can definitely be described as a leading light on the region’s restaurant scene. The restaurant is renowned for its excellent fish, which is usually cooked in classic style (fish stew and mixed steamed fish served on steamed vegetables are prime examples) and often announced at your table, although a concise menu is also available. The elegant dining room is enhanced by a collection of striking works of art.
